text: Bambang Suryadi, also known by his nickname Basur (1 October 1968 â€” 4 January 2021) was an Indonesian politician. He was a member of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle. Suryadi was a member of the People's Representative Council from 2019 until his death in 2021. Suryadi was born in Blitar, East Java. Suryadi died on 4 January 2021 at a Jakarta hospital due to COVID-19, aged 52. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Jakarta Category:Indonesian politicians
title: Bambang Suryadi
